name: Sunil
greetingText: Data Scientist by day, Tech Blogger by night. Tweeting through the darkness to keep the tech alive.
wishText: May our blessigs always be with you! :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what we were going to do.
text4: We realised, we wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell us if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
